 25     /**
 26      * Renders the user listing page.
 27      *
 28      * This page renders a table of users, with dropdown menus for admin actions for each user.
 29      * Actions typically include: edit user details, activate user, enable/disable user, delete user.
 30      * This page requires authentication.
 31      * Request type: GET
 32      * @param string $primary_group_name optional.  If specified, will only display users in that particular primary group.
 33      * @param bool $paginate_server_side optional.  Set to true if you want UF to load each page of results via AJAX on demand, rather than all at once.
 34      * @todo implement interface to modify user-assigned authorization hooks and permissions
 35      */        
 36     public function pageUsers($primary_group_name = null, $paginate_server_side = true){
 37         // Optional filtering by primary group
 38         if ($primary_group_name){
 39             $primary_group = GroupLoader::fetch($primary_group_name, 'name');
 40             
 41             if (!$primary_group)
 42                 $this->_app->notFound();
 43             
 44             // Access-controlled page
 45             if (!$this->_app->user->checkAccess('uri_group_users', ['primary_group_id' => $primary_group->id])){
 46                 $this->_app->notFound();
 47             }
 48         
 49             if (!$paginate_server_side)
 50                 $users = UserLoader::fetchAll($primary_group->id, 'primary_group_id');
 51             $name = $primary_group->name;
 52             $icon = $primary_group->icon;
 53 
 54         } else {
 55             // Access-controlled page
 56             if (!$this->_app->user->checkAccess('uri_users')){
 57                 $this->_app->notFound();
 58             }
 59             
 60             if (!$paginate_server_side) {
 61                 $user_collection = (new User)->get();
 62                 $user_collection->getRecentEvents('sign_in');
 63                 $user_collection->getRecentEvents('sign_up', 'sign_up_time');                
 64             }
 65             $name = "Users";
 66             $icon = "fa fa-users";
 67         }
 68         
 69         $this->_app->render('users/users.twig', [
 70             "box_title" => $name,
 71             "icon" => $icon,
 72             "primary_group_name" => $primary_group_name,
 73             "paginate_server_side" => $paginate_server_side,
 74             "users" => isset($user_collection) ? $user_collection->toArray() : []
 75         ]);          
 76     }

 78     /**
 79      * Renders a page displaying a user's information, in read-only mode.
 80      *
 81      * This checks that the currently logged-in user has permission to view the requested user's info.
 82      * It checks each field individually, showing only those that you have permission to view.
 83      * This will also try to show buttons for activating, disabling/enabling, deleting, and editing the user.
 84      * This page requires authentication.
 85      * Request type: GET
 86      * @param string $user_id The id of the user to view.
 87      */  
 88     public function pageUser($user_id){
 89         // Get the user to view
 90         $target_user = UserLoader::fetch($user_id);    
 91         
 92         // If the user no longer exists, forward to main user page
 93         if (!$target_user)
 94             $this->_app->redirect($this->_app->urlFor('uri_users'));
 95         
 96         // Access-controlled resource
 97         if (!$this->_app->user->checkAccess('uri_users') && !$this->_app->user->checkAccess('uri_group_users', ['primary_group_id' => $target_user->primary_group_id])){
 98             $this->_app->notFound();
 99         }
100     
101         // Get a list of all groups
102         $groups = GroupLoader::fetchAll();
103         
104         // Get a list of all locales
105         $locale_list = $this->_app->site->getLocales();
106         
107         // Determine which groups this user is a member of
108         $user_groups = $target_user->getGroupIds();
109         foreach ($groups as $group){
110             $group_id = $group->id;
111             $group_list[$group_id] = $group->export();
112             if (in_array($group_id, $user_groups))
113                 $group_list[$group_id]['member'] = true;
114             else
115                 $group_list[$group_id]['member'] = false;
116         }    
117     
118         // Determine authorized fields
119         $fields = ['display_name', 'email', 'title', 'locale', 'groups', 'primary_group_id'];
120         $show_fields = [];
121         $disabled_fields = [];
122         $hidden_fields = [];
123         foreach ($fields as $field){
124             if ($this->_app->user->checkAccess("view_account_setting", ["user" => $target_user, "property" => $field]))
125                 $disabled_fields[] = $field;
126             else
127                 $hidden_fields[] = $field;
128         }    
129         
130         // Always disallow editing username
131         $disabled_fields[] = "user_name";
132         
133         // Load validator rules
134         $schema = new \Fortress\RequestSchema($this->_app->config('schema.path') . "/forms/user-update.json");
135         $this->_app->jsValidator->setSchema($schema);             
136         
137         $this->_app->render('users/user-info.twig', [
138             "box_id" => 'view-user',
139             "box_title" => $target_user->user_name,
140             "target_user" => $target_user,
141             "groups" => $group_list,
142             "locales" => $locale_list,
143             "fields" => [
144                 "disabled" => $disabled_fields,
145                 "hidden" => $hidden_fields
146             ],
147             "buttons" => [
148                 "hidden" => [
149                     "submit", "cancel"
150                 ]
151             ],
152             "validators" => $this->_app->jsValidator->rules()   
153         ]);   
154     }

156     /**
157      * Renders the form for creating a new user.
158      *
159      * This does NOT render a complete page.  Instead, it renders the HTML for the form, which can be embedded in other pages.
160      * The form can be rendered in "modal" (for popup) or "panel" mode, depending on the value of the GET parameter `render`.
161      * If the currently logged-in user has permission to modify user group membership, then the group toggles will be displayed.
162      * Otherwise, the user will be added to the default groups automatically.
163      * This page requires authentication.
164      * Request type: GET
165      */  
166     public function formUserCreate(){
167         // Access-controlled resource
168         if (!$this->_app->user->checkAccess('create_account')){
169             $this->_app->notFound();
170         }
171         
172         $get = $this->_app->request->get();
173         
174         if (isset($get['render']))
175             $render = $get['render'];
176         else
177             $render = "modal";
178         
179         // Get a list of all groups
180         $groups = Group::all()->getDictionary();
181         
182         // Get a list of all locales
183         $locale_list = $this->_app->site->getLocales();
184         
185         // Get default primary group (is_default = GROUP_DEFAULT_PRIMARY)
186         $primary_group = Group::where("is_default", GROUP_DEFAULT_PRIMARY)->first();
187         
188         // If there is no default primary group, there is a problem.  Show an error message for now.
189         if (!$primary_group){
190             $this->_app->alerts->addMessageTranslated("danger", "GROUP_DEFAULT_PRIMARY_NOT_DEFINED");
191             $this->_app->halt(500);
192         }
193         
194         // Get the default groups
195         $default_groups = Group::all()->where("is_default", GROUP_DEFAULT)->getDictionary();
196         
197         // Set default groups, including default primary group
198         foreach ($groups as $group_id => $group){
199             $group_list[$group_id] = $group->export();
200             if (isset($default_groups[$group_id]) || $group_id == $primary_group->id)
201                 $group_list[$group_id]['member'] = true;
202             else
203                 $group_list[$group_id]['member'] = false;
204         }
205         
206         $data['primary_group_id'] = $primary_group->id;
207         // Set default title for new users
208         $data['title'] = $primary_group->new_user_title;
209         // Set default locale
210         $data['locale'] = $this->_app->site->default_locale;
211         
212         // Create a dummy user to prepopulate fields
213         $target_user = new User($data);        
214         
215         if ($render == "modal")
216             $template = "components/common/user-info-modal.twig";
217         else
218             $template = "components/common/user-info-panel.twig";
219         
220         // Determine authorized fields for those that have default values.  Don't hide any fields
221         $fields = ['title', 'locale', 'groups', 'primary_group_id'];
222         $show_fields = [];
223         $disabled_fields = [];
224         $hidden_fields = [];
225         foreach ($fields as $field){
226             if ($this->_app->user->checkAccess("update_account_setting", ["user" => $target_user, "property" => $field]))
227                 $show_fields[] = $field;
228             else
229                 $disabled_fields[] = $field;
230         }    
231         
232         // Load validator rules
233         $schema = new \Fortress\RequestSchema($this->_app->config('schema.path') . "/forms/user-create.json");
234         $this->_app->jsValidator->setSchema($schema);        
235         
236         $this->_app->render($template, [
237             "box_id" => $get['box_id'],
238             "box_title" => "Create User",
239             "submit_button" => "Create user",
240             "form_action" => $this->_app->site->uri['public'] . "/users",
241             "target_user" => $target_user,
242             "groups" => $group_list,
243             "locales" => $locale_list,
244             "fields" => [
245                 "disabled" => $disabled_fields,
246                 "hidden" => $hidden_fields
247             ],
248             "buttons" => [
249                 "hidden" => [
250                     "edit", "enable", "delete", "activate"
251                 ]
252             ],
253             "validators" => $this->_app->jsValidator->rules()
254         ]);   
255     }

257     /**
258      * Renders the form for editing an existing user.
259      *
260      * This does NOT render a complete page.  Instead, it renders the HTML for the form, which can be embedded in other pages.
261      * The form can be rendered in "modal" (for popup) or "panel" mode, depending on the value of the GET parameter `render`.
262      * For each field, we will first check if the currently logged-in user has permission to update the field.  If so,
263      * the field will be rendered as editable.  If not, we will check if they have permission to view the field.  If so,
264      * it will be displayed but disabled.  If they have neither permission, the field will be hidden.
265      * This page requires authentication.
266      * Request type: GET
267      * @param int $user_id the id of the user to edit.
268      */    
269     public function formUserEdit($user_id){
270         // Get the user to edit
271         $target_user = UserLoader::fetch($user_id);        
272         
273         // Access-controlled resource
274         if (!$this->_app->user->checkAccess('uri_users') && !$this->_app->user->checkAccess('uri_group_users', ['primary_group_id' => $target_user->primary_group_id])){
275             $this->_app->notFound();
276         }
277         
278         $get = $this->_app->request->get();
279         
280         if (isset($get['render']))
281             $render = $get['render'];
282         else
283             $render = "modal";
284         
285         // Get a list of all groups
286         $groups = GroupLoader::fetchAll();
287         
288         // Get a list of all locales
289         $locale_list = $this->_app->site->getLocales();
290         
291         // Determine which groups this user is a member of
292         $user_groups = $target_user->getGroups();
293         foreach ($groups as $group_id => $group){
294             $group_list[$group_id] = $group->export();
295             if (isset($user_groups[$group_id]))
296                 $group_list[$group_id]['member'] = true;
297             else
298                 $group_list[$group_id]['member'] = false;
299         }
300         
301         if ($render == "modal")
302             $template = "components/common/user-info-modal.twig";
303         else
304             $template = "components/common/user-info-panel.twig";
305         
306         // Determine authorized fields
307         $fields = ['display_name', 'email', 'title', 'locale', 'groups', 'primary_group_id'];
308         $show_fields = [];
309         $disabled_fields = [];
310         $hidden_fields = [];
311         foreach ($fields as $field){
312             if ($this->_app->user->checkAccess("update_account_setting", ["user" => $target_user, "property" => $field]))
313                 $show_fields[] = $field;
314             else if ($this->_app->user->checkAccess("view_account_setting", ["user" => $target_user, "property" => $field]))
315                 $disabled_fields[] = $field;
316             else
317                 $hidden_fields[] = $field;
318         }
319         
320         // Always disallow editing username
321         $disabled_fields[] = "user_name";
322                 
323         // Load validator rules
324         $schema = new \Fortress\RequestSchema($this->_app->config('schema.path') . "/forms/user-update.json");
325         $this->_app->jsValidator->setSchema($schema);  
326         
327         $this->_app->render($template, [
328             "box_id" => $get['box_id'],
329             "box_title" => "Edit User",
330             "submit_button" => "Update user",
331             "form_action" => $this->_app->site->uri['public'] . "/users/u/$user_id",
332             "target_user" => $target_user,
333             "groups" => $group_list,
334             "locales" => $locale_list,
335             "fields" => [
336                 "disabled" => $disabled_fields,
337                 "hidden" => $hidden_fields
338             ],
339             "buttons" => [
340                 "hidden" => [
341                     "edit", "enable", "delete", "activate"
342                 ]
343             ],
344             "validators" => $this->_app->jsValidator->rules()
345         ]);   
346     }

389     /** 
390      * Processes the request to create a new user (from the admin controls).
391      * 
392      * Processes the request from the user creation form, checking that:
393      * 1. The username and email are not already in use;
394      * 2. The logged-in user has the necessary permissions to update the posted field(s);
395      * 3. The submitted data is valid.
396      * This route requires authentication.
397      * Request type: POST
398      * @see formUserCreate
399      */
400     public function createUser(){
401         $post = $this->_app->request->post();
402         
403         // Load the request schema
404         $requestSchema = new \Fortress\RequestSchema($this->_app->config('schema.path') . "/forms/user-create.json");
405         
406         // Get the alert message stream
407         $ms = $this->_app->alerts; 
408         
409         // Access-controlled resource
410         if (!$this->_app->user->checkAccess('create_account')){
411             $ms->addMessageTranslated("danger", "ACCESS_DENIED");
412             $this->_app->halt(403);
413         }
414 
415         // Set up Fortress to process the request
416         $rf = new \Fortress\HTTPRequestFortress($ms, $requestSchema, $post);        
417   
418         // Sanitize data
419         $rf->sanitize();
420                 
421         // Validate, and halt on validation errors.
422         $error = !$rf->validate(true);
423         
424         // Get the filtered data
425         $data = $rf->data();        
426         
427         // Remove csrf_token from object data
428         $rf->removeFields(['csrf_token']);
429         
430         // Perform desired data transformations on required fields.  Is this a feature we could add to Fortress?
431         $data['display_name'] = trim($data['display_name']);
432         $data['email'] = strtolower(trim($data['email']));
433         $data['flag_verified'] = 1;
434         // Set password as empty on initial creation.  We will then send email so new user can set it themselves via secret token        
435         $data['password'] = "";
436         
437         // Check if username or email already exists
438         if (UserLoader::exists($data['user_name'], 'user_name')){
439             $ms->addMessageTranslated("danger", "ACCOUNT_USERNAME_IN_USE", $data);
440             $error = true;
441         }
442 
443         if (UserLoader::exists($data['email'], 'email')){
444             $ms->addMessageTranslated("danger", "ACCOUNT_EMAIL_IN_USE", $data);
445             $error = true;
446         }
447         
448         // Halt on any validation errors
449         if ($error) {
450             $this->_app->halt(400);
451         }
452     
453         // Get default primary group (is_default = GROUP_DEFAULT_PRIMARY)
454         $primaryGroup = GroupLoader::fetch(GROUP_DEFAULT_PRIMARY, "is_default");
455             
456         // Set default values if not specified or not authorized
457         if (!isset($data['locale']) || !$this->_app->user->checkAccess("update_account_setting", ["property" => "locale"]))
458             $data['locale'] = $this->_app->site->default_locale;
459             
460         if (!isset($data['title']) || !$this->_app->user->checkAccess("update_account_setting", ["property" => "title"])) {
461             // Set default title for new users
462             $data['title'] = $primaryGroup->new_user_title;
463         }
464         
465         if (!isset($data['primary_group_id']) || !$this->_app->user->checkAccess("update_account_setting", ["property" => "primary_group_id"])) {
466             $data['primary_group_id'] = $primaryGroup->id;
467         }
468         
469         // Set groups to default groups if not specified or not authorized to set groups
470         if (!isset($data['groups']) || !$this->_app->user->checkAccess("update_account_setting", ["property" => "groups"])) {
471             $default_groups = GroupLoader::fetchAll(GROUP_DEFAULT, "is_default");
472             $data['groups'] = [];
473             foreach ($default_groups as $group_id => $group){
474                 $data['groups'][$group_id] = "1";
475             }
476         }
477         
478         // Create the user
479         $user = new User($data);
480         
481         // Add user to groups, including selected primary group
482         $user->addGroup($data['primary_group_id']);
483         foreach ($data['groups'] as $group_id => $is_member) {
484             if ($is_member == "1"){      
485                 $user->addGroup($group_id);    
486             }
487         }
488         
489         // Create events - account creation and password reset
490         $user->newEventSignUp($this->_app->user);
491         $user->newEventPasswordReset();    
492         
493         // Save user again after creating events
494         $user->save();             
495         
496         // Send an email to the user's email address to set up password
497         $twig = $this->_app->view()->getEnvironment();
498         $template = $twig->loadTemplate("mail/password-create.twig");        
499         $notification = new Notification($template);
500         $notification->fromWebsite();      // Automatically sets sender and reply-to
501         $notification->addEmailRecipient($user->email, $user->display_name, [
502             'user' => $user,
503             'create_password_expiration' => $this->_app->site->create_password_expiration / 3600 . " hours"
504         ]);
505         
506         try {
507             $notification->send();
508         } catch (\Exception\phpmailerException $e){
509             $ms->addMessageTranslated("danger", "MAIL_ERROR");
510             error_log('Mailer Error: ' . $e->errorMessage());
511             $this->_app->halt(500);
512         }
513         
514         // Success message
515         $ms->addMessageTranslated("success", "ACCOUNT_CREATION_COMPLETE", $data);
516     }

518     /** 
519      * Processes the request to update an existing user's details, including enabled/disabled status and activation status.
520      * 
521      * Processes the request from the user update form, checking that:
522      * 1. The target user's new email address, if specified, is not already in use;
523      * 2. The logged-in user has the necessary permissions to update the posted field(s);
524      * 3. We're not trying to disable the master account;
525      * 4. The submitted data is valid.
526      * This route requires authentication.
527      * Request type: POST
528      * @param int $user_id the id of the user to edit.     
529      * @see formUserEdit
530      */      
531     public function updateUser($user_id){
532         $post = $this->_app->request->post();
533         
534         // Load the request schema
535         $requestSchema = new \Fortress\RequestSchema($this->_app->config('schema.path') . "/forms/user-update.json");
536         
537         // Get the alert message stream
538         $ms = $this->_app->alerts; 
539         
540         // Get the target user
541         $target_user = User::find($user_id);
542         
543         // Get the target user's groups
544         $groups = $target_user->getGroups();
545         
546         /*
547         // Access control for entire page
548         if (!$this->_app->user->checkAccess('uri_update_user')){
549             $ms->addMessageTranslated("danger", "ACCESS_DENIED");
550             $this->_app->halt(403);
551         }
552         */
553         
554         // Only the master account can edit the master account!
555         if (($target_user->id == $this->_app->config('user_id_master')) && $this->_app->user->id != $this->_app->config('user_id_master')) {
556             $ms->addMessageTranslated("danger", "ACCESS_DENIED");
557             $this->_app->halt(403);
558         }
559         
560         // Remove csrf_token
561         unset($post['csrf_token']);
562         
563         // Set up Fortress to process the request
564         $rf = new \Fortress\HTTPRequestFortress($ms, $requestSchema, $post);          
565         
566         if (isset($post['passwordc'])){
567             unset($post['passwordc']);        
568         }
569            
570         // Check authorization for submitted fields, if the value has been changed
571         foreach ($post as $name => $value) {
572             if ($name == "groups" || (isset($target_user->$name) && $post[$name] != $target_user->$name)){
573                 // Check authorization
574                 if (!$this->_app->user->checkAccess('update_account_setting', ['user' => $target_user, 'property' => $name])){
575                     $ms->addMessageTranslated("danger", "ACCESS_DENIED");
576                     $this->_app->halt(403);
577                 }
578             } else if (!isset($target_user->$name)) {
579                 $ms->addMessageTranslated("danger", "NO_DATA");
580                 $this->_app->halt(400);
581             }
582         }
583         
584         // Check that we are not disabling the master account
585         if (($target_user->id == $this->_app->config('user_id_master')) && isset($post['flag_enabled']) && $post['flag_enabled'] == "0"){
586             $ms->addMessageTranslated("danger", "ACCOUNT_DISABLE_MASTER");
587             $this->_app->halt(403);
588         }
589         
590         // Check that the email address is not in use
591         if (isset($post['email']) && $post['email'] != $target_user->email && UserLoader::exists($post['email'], 'email')){
592             $ms->addMessageTranslated("danger", "ACCOUNT_EMAIL_IN_USE", $post);
593             $this->_app->halt(400);
594         }
595         
596         // Sanitize
597         $rf->sanitize();
598     
599         // Validate, and halt on validation errors.
600         if (!$rf->validate()) {
601             $this->_app->halt(400);
602         }   
603         
604         // Remove passwordc
605         $rf->removeFields(['passwordc']);
606            
607         // Get the filtered data
608         $data = $rf->data();
609         
610         // Update user groups
611         if (isset($data['groups'])){
612             foreach ($data['groups'] as $group_id => $is_member) {
613                 if ($is_member == "1" && !isset($groups[$group_id])){
614                     $target_user->addGroup($group_id);
615                 } else if ($is_member == "0" && isset($groups[$group_id])){
616                     $target_user->removeGroup($group_id);
617                 }
618             }
619             unset($data['groups']);
620         }
621         
622         // Hash password
623         if (isset($data['password'])){
624             $data['password'] = Authentication::hashPassword($data['password']);
625         }
626         
627         // Update the user and generate success messages
628         foreach ($data as $name => $value){
629             if ($value != $target_user->$name){
630                 $target_user->$name = $value;
631                 // Custom success messages (optional)
632                 if ($name == "flag_enabled") {
633                     if ($value == "1")
634                         $ms->addMessageTranslated("success", "ACCOUNT_ENABLE_SUCCESSFUL", ["user_name" => $target_user->user_name]);
635                     else
636                         $ms->addMessageTranslated("success", "ACCOUNT_DISABLE_SUCCESSFUL", ["user_name" => $target_user->user_name]);
637                 }
638                 if ($name == "flag_verified") {
639                     $ms->addMessageTranslated("success", "ACCOUNT_MANUALLY_ACTIVATED", ["user_name" => $target_user->user_name]);
640                 }
641             }
642         }
643         
644         // If we're generating a password reset, create the corresponding event and shoot off an email
645         if (isset($data['flag_password_reset']) && ($data['flag_password_reset'] == "1")){
646             // Recheck auth
647             if (!$this->_app->user->checkAccess('update_account_setting', ['user' => $target_user, 'property' => 'flag_password_reset'])){
648                 $ms->addMessageTranslated("danger", "ACCESS_DENIED");
649                 $this->_app->halt(403);
650             }
651             // New password reset event - bypass any rate limiting
652             $target_user->newEventPasswordReset();
653             $target_user->save();
654             // Email the user asking to confirm this change password request
655             $twig = $this->_app->view()->getEnvironment();
656             $template = $twig->loadTemplate("mail/password-reset.twig");        
657             $notification = new Notification($template);
658             $notification->fromWebsite();      // Automatically sets sender and reply-to
659             $notification->addEmailRecipient($target_user->email, $target_user->display_name, [
660                 "user" => $target_user,
661                 "request_date" => date("Y-m-d H:i:s")
662             ]);
663             
664             try {
665                 $notification->send();
666             } catch (\Exception\phpmailerException $e){
667                 $ms->addMessageTranslated("danger", "MAIL_ERROR");
668                 error_log('Mailer Error: ' . $e->errorMessage());
669                 $this->_app->halt(500);
670             }
671             
672             $ms->addMessageTranslated("success", "FORGOTPASS_REQUEST_SENT", ["user_name" => $target_user->user_name]);
673         }
674         
675         $ms->addMessageTranslated("success", "ACCOUNT_DETAILS_UPDATED", ["user_name" => $target_user->user_name]);
676         $target_user->save();        
677     }

679     /** 
680      * Processes the request to delete an existing user.
681      * 
682      * Deletes the specified user, removing associations with any groups and any user-specific authorization rules.
683      * Before doing so, checks that:
684      * 1. You are not trying to delete the master account;
685      * 2. You have permission to delete user user accounts.
686      * This route requires authentication (and should generally be limited to admins or the root user).
687      * Request type: POST
688      * @param int $user_id the id of the user to delete.     
689      */       
690     public function deleteUser($user_id){
691         $post = $this->_app->request->post();
692     
693         // Get the target user
694         $target_user = UserLoader::fetch($user_id);
695     
696         // Get the alert message stream
697         $ms = $this->_app->alerts;
698         
699         // Check authorization
700         if (!$this->_app->user->checkAccess('delete_account', ['user' => $target_user])){
701             $ms->addMessageTranslated("danger", "ACCESS_DENIED");
702             $this->_app->halt(403);
703         }
704                 
705         // Check that we are not disabling the master account
706         if (($target_user->id == $this->_app->config('user_id_master'))){
707             $ms->addMessageTranslated("danger", "ACCOUNT_DELETE_MASTER");
708             $this->_app->halt(403);
709         }
710         
711         $ms->addMessageTranslated("success", "ACCOUNT_DELETION_SUCCESSFUL", ["user_name" => $target_user->user_name]);
712         $target_user->delete();
713         unset($target_user);
714     }
